name: The Last Survivor (itch)
description:
Awesome Battleroyale game

All bugs can be submitted here: https://goo.gl/forms/LiirFBcBz5xdYoBA3

The Last survivor brings you awesome and FREE battleroyale experience...

What I have done so far:

An 4x4 Km map based on an island

Flooding system

Diffirent weapons(Mele and guns)

Nice and easy to use UI and Inventory

Crouch mechanics

What Im going to add:

Working vehicles + Airplanes

Graphic settings + Keybindings

More cities/loot locations

More weapons

Dedicated servers

Laying down mechanics

Im a new 16 y.o developer and this is my first serious procject that I did 99% my self
